meaningMnemonic: If <radical>someone</radical> wants to <radical>boil</radical>, you let them <kanji>boil</kanji>!
readingMnemonic: Welp, the pot is at a rolling <kanji>boil</kanji> and your <reading>knee</reading> (に) is in there. The person wasn't saying they wanted to boil, they said they wanted to boil someone. And that meant you. Well, your knee anyway.
